description.title: Visibility Config: transparent contract, call storageAt with a guessing game
description.purpose:
Use a simple guessing game, with VisibilityConfig.isTransparent set to true. This opens up calls to get_storage_at, and additionally makes all event public. In this test only calls to get_storage_at are used to try and figure out the secret number to guess, and to win the game in a single call.
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/3933
